properties.name: tableName
properties.description: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: tableId
properties.description: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: Define Below for Each Column
properties.description: Set the value for each destination column

properties.name: inputsToIgnore
properties.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

properties.name: columnsUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: rowId
properties.description: Add destination column with its value

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the link column in the returned row is the ID of the linked row or the name of the linked row

properties.name: order_by
properties.description: A column's name or ID, use this column to sort the rows. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
